snippet: The American Jordan Burroughs extended his undefeated streak to 65 matches with a 4-0 victory over Iran’s Ezzatollah Akbarizarinkolaei in the 163-pound category in Budapest.
abstract: American wrestler Jordan Burroughs extends undefeated streak to 65 matches with 4-0 victory over Iran's Ezzatollah Akbarizarinkolaei in 163-pound category in Budapest.
lead_paragraph: The American Jordan Burroughs extended his undefeated streak to 65 matches with a 4-0 victory over Iran’s Ezzatollah Akbarizarinkolaei in the 163-pound category in Budapest.

headline.print_headline: American Wins Title And 65th Bout in a Row
